raw_comment:
I noticed that more legacies get in than non legacy applicants.
I wonder how many of the people that are admitted actually go to this college.
This is relevant to me and my community because I am applying to college and this shows my chances depending on if I’m a legacy
My caption is “How the rich grow richer”
ace_sentences: I noticed that more legacy applicants are admitted than non-legacy applicants.
I wonder how many admitted people actually attend this college.
This topic is relevant to me.
This topic is relevant to my community.
This information shows my chances of admission.
My chances of admission depend on whether I am a legacy applicant.
My caption is "How the rich grow richer".
